title: Personal Portfolio
description: Welcome, you are already viewing my personal portfolio. It is deployed via github pages and highlights my work history, education, a little about me, and some projects that I have completed.

title: Photo Journal
description: Completed as my capstone project for Ada Developers Academy, this is a mobile iOS app that acts as a photo journal. A user can create journal entries and add a title, date, location, text, and up to three pictures from their camera roll. This entry is saved directly to their phone and can be pulled up again for viewing from either a list or map overlay.

title: Inspiration Board (back end)
description: Inspiration Board lets users create boards that contain cards with motivational sayings. For the back-end we created models for our database and a custom REST API to communicate with said database via CRUD routes. This was a group project driven by pair programming.

title: Inspiration Board (front end)
description: For the front-end we used React to build components and communicate with our API using axios. Both the front-end and back-end are deployed on Heroku. (Note that this project needs to be migrated off of Heroku's deactivated free tier.)

title: Project Manager
description: Following a tutorial on Frontend Masters, this is a personal project manager. It is a work in progress, but you can create an account to explore.
